issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: I able to recevie the push notification but the badge number on the IOS app icon is not incease or update when the notification come in.
fields.summary: iOS: Badge doesn't update when multiple push notification is received.

comments.body:
Hello, I can reproduce the issue. After push is received, budget shows 1 then send 2 or 3 more, badge never increases or update. 

Test Environment:
{code}
Operating System
  Name                        = Mac OS X
  Version                     = 10.12.3
  Architecture                = 64bit
  # CPUs                      = 4
  Memory                      = 8589934592
Node.js
  Node.js Version             = 4.6.2
  npm Version                 = 2.15.11
Titanium CLI
  CLI Version                 = 5.0.11
Titanium SDK
  SDK Version                 = 6.0.1.GA
  Target Platform             = iphone 5s 10.2.1
{code}
